title: Busfest last chance to book please read

posts.content: Hi, if you have't already booked now's the time to do so. If we don't have enough members we could end up loosing the field or at best having to share it. Members are allowed one quest vehicle as long as they turn up with you. Please have your membership card with you on arrival. The booking code is in the members only part of the forum Eddy

yeah come on, we don't want to lose the field and we don't want to clog the wanted section with ads for tickets at the last minute..

Steve

Would have liked to camp in the SSVC field but as going with a mate in a T5 and another with a 356 I had to buy general camping.

If the rules for next year changed to allow 2 guests it would great....

Thanks
I'm in there, great camping wouldn't want to loose it.

If numbers are down this year it could be to do with Symonds Yat being the following weekend.
It's a long way to drive two weeks in a row for those not local.
I suspect it will fill up though it usually does.

Can someone send me the booking code? I'm a member but not got my account/membership linked to get into the members area. I've messaged nige, but the message is still in my outbox for some reason?

Regards

Rick

I might be interested in camping there but I have a general camping pass as do my two friends, would we just be able to camp there?? It would help with numbers and two of the vans are splits - I don't know what the other is
